summary: This document is an email containing a list of press clippings from July 24, 2020, compiled by the SDNY (Southern District of New York). It includes links to news articles covering topics such as Global Entry, Michael Cohen, Wirecard, and Ghislaine Maxwell. The Maxwell-related articles concern a judge's ruling on unsealing records in a defamation case and political commentary targeting Trump.

persons.name: Michael Cohen
persons.context: Mentioned in a press clip regarding his release back to home confinement.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of press clips about a judge ruling on unsealing records in a defamation case and political videos targeting Trump's comments about her.

persons.name: Trump
persons.context: Mentioned in a press clip about political videos targeting his comments on Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Scholz
persons.context: Mentioned in a Reuters article about backing tougher oversight ahead of a Wirecard hearing.

events.title: SDNY Press Clippings Compilation
events.description: The Southern District of New York compiles and distributes a list of press clippings covering various legal and political news stories.

events.title: Judge Rules on Unsealing Maxwell Defamation Records
events.description: A judge is set to rule on unsealing records in a defamation case involving Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Michael Cohen Released to Home Confinement
events.description: Michael Cohen is released back to home confinement, as reported in a press clip.

keyFacts: The document is a press clipping summary email from the SDNY dated July 24, 2020.
It references ongoing legal proceedings related to Ghislaine Maxwell, specifically a defamation case where a judge is ruling on unsealing records.
It mentions Michael Cohen's release to home confinement.
It notes political commentary targeting President Trump's remarks about Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document shows the SDNY monitoring media coverage of various cases and individuals of interest.
